meanings: a secondary effect[an aftermath] of an economic panic

vlive.korean: [스포의 여파] 심장 떨려. [Aftermath of spoiler] My heart is beating fast. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NU'EST] 얼떨결에 스포왕이 된 동호(쭈굴) (BAEKHO giving spoiler which he didn’t mean to)
vlive.english: [Aftermath of spoiler] My heart is beating fast.

vlive.korean: '도깨비' 아 근데 그거는 그 여파를 봐선 헤어나올 수 없을 것 같아. "The Guardian"... I feel like the aftermath of that will be difficult to handle. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 차 한잔..더?🍵😚
vlive.english: "The Guardian"... I feel like the aftermath of that will be difficult to handle.

vlive.korean: 이제 끝났으니까 좀 울어야겠다... - 난 진짜 여파가 좀 오래갈 것 같아... Now that it's over, I think I should go cry. - This is going to effect me for some time. 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : <쎈마이웨이> 반려동물이 떠났어요
vlive.english: Now that it's over, I think I should go cry. - This is going to effect me for some time.

vlive.korean: 여파가 있네요. -몸이 안 좋았어. It's because of that. - I wasn't feeling good. 듣기 View video Show! Music core : 쇼! 음악중심 '5분 딜레이~' Show! Music core
vlive.english: It's because of that. - I wasn't feeling good.

vlive.korean: 어제 지진의 여파가 지금도 있는것같아. I think it's because of yesterday's earthquake. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : BLOOMY - 블루미 '여사친들의 험난한 운동'
vlive.english: I think it's because of yesterday's earthquake.
